item.title: Sobrevive al inframundo de los tests end to end
item.description: Given at: Codemotion Madrid 2017 Language: spanish Presentation: Speaker Deck Abstract: How to survive to the underworld of end-to-end testing is an overview of tips and tricks we learn during or work with ATDD, Cucumber and Gherkin. Youtube Speakerdeck
